welcome.title: welcome to my site
welcome.description: Domain the written and spoken skills of the Spanish language with engaging lessons and fast resaults!

services.title: My Services
services.service1Descr: Classes are just for one person, so they will be personalized to your level and progress.
services.service2Descr: Take advantage of the economic prices for our lessons.
services.service3Descr: You will be taught with the most advanced and effective learning methods.

whoAmI.title: Who Am I?
whoAmI.header: Hi, I’m Javier, I’ll be teaching you Spanish
whoAmI.description: Discover what makes my lessons so effective

moreAbout.title: More About Myself
moreAbout.description: I enjoy spending time with simple things like going to a library and pass the time turning pages, but also I find it exciting just to be wandering on the streets trying to figure out what is going on with the people around me.

everyStudent.title: Every new student is part of a great community!
everyStudent.description: I would love to make a much bigger community of friends, my students, to share and travel around Colombia. I could show you more about my beautiful country and I will help you plan your next trip to Colombia!

signupPage.title: Welcome to SpanIA
signupPage.minPasswordError: Password must have at least 6 characters
signupPage.phoneError: Invalid phone number. It should be 10 digits long.
